1:
Yahweh, help us! It seems like people who honor you are no more,\q2 that those who are loyal to you have all vanished.


\q1
2:
Everyone tells lies to other people;\q2 they deceive others by flattering them, but they tell lies.
\q1
3:
Yahweh, we wish that you would cut off their tongues\q2 so that they cannot continue to boast.
\q1
4:
They say, "By telling lies we will get what we want;\q2 we control what we say, so no one can tell us what we should do!"



\q1
5:
But Yahweh replies, "I have seen the violent things that they have done to helpless people;\q2 I have heard those people groaning,
\q2 so I will arise and rescue the people who are wanting me to help them."



\q1
6:
Yahweh, you always do what you have promised to do;\q2 what you have promised is as precious and pure as silver
\q2 that has been heated seven times in a furnace to get rid of all the impure material.
\q1
7:
Yahweh, we know that you will protect us who honor you\q2 from those wicked people,
\q2
8: those who strut around proudly,\q2 while people praise them for doing evil deeds.
